text: William Jones (26 February 1676 – 29 November 1725Foster, J., Oxford Men and their Colleges, 1893), born Kidwelly, Wales, was Principal of Jesus College, Oxford, from 1720 to 1725. He had previously been a student of the college, obtaining his BA in 1697, his MA in 1700, his BD in 1708 and his DD in 1720. ==References== Category:1676 births Category:1725 deaths Category:People from Carmarthenshire Category:Alumni of Jesus College, Oxford Category:Fellows of Jesus College, Oxford Category:Principals of Jesus College, Oxford Category:People from Kidwelly
title: William Jones (college principal)
